document_data.name: Cragmaw Tribe
document_data.mainbody: The '''Cragmaw''' were a tribe of [[goblin]]s, [[bugbear]]s, and [[hobgoblin]]s operating in the [[Neverwinter Wood]] and on the [[Triboar Trail (region)|Triboar Trail]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Description: The members of the tribe sharpened their teeth, which led to the name of the tribe. King [[Grol]] ruled the tribe as a whole from [[Cragmaw Castle]], while [[Klarg]] led a smaller group from the [[Cragmaw Hideout]].
document_data.History: The Cragmaws were hired by [[Nezznar]] to capture [[Gundren Rockseeker]] in the {{YearlinkName|1491}}.{{Phandelver-time}}
